text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/who-smart-hiv-dak/CodeSystem/concept-codes
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    HIV.D.DE450Pregnant at ART startPregnant and breastfeeding status at ART start - Pregnant at ART start
    HIV.D.DE451Postpartum at ART startPregnant and breastfeeding status at ART start - Postpartum at ART start
    HIV.D.DE452ART start at labour and deliveryPregnant and breastfeeding status at ART start - ART start at labour and delivery
    HIV.D.DE453Breastfeeding at ART startPregnant and breastfeeding status at ART start - Breastfeeding at ART start

name: PregnantandbreastfeedingstatusatARTstartCodes
title: Pregnant and breastfeeding status at ART start Codes
description: Codes representing possible values for the Pregnant and breastfeeding status at ART start element
